message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,000,000. I believe this reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. While I understand its value, I am only able to offer $1,200,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our positions.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $2,000,000 is significantly closer to its true value.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,700,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still unable to meet at $1,700,000. I would like to propose $1,600,000 as my final offer.
